item.description:
This spookalicious spooktacular meetup is co-posted to Fun with Alcohol, Boston Happy Hour, Boston Social Fitness, Facebook, & Pub Crawlers of Boston!!

"Descend into the depths"!

4:30PM: Charlies Kitchen-- outdoors in the foundation of a house basement!
It is "heated by a stove". (We'll meet indoors if rain or cold)

5:15 PM: Shays, 58 JFK St. A semi-cellar. Downstairs.

6:00 PM: Spooky Silent Disco --WINTHROP PARK
http://www.yelp.com/biz/winthrop-park-cambridge
Co-posted to Social Fun also
http://www.meetup.com/SocialFun/events/81160942/
...stay at Shays if not interested, or go early to the next windowless cellar if you don't like the light--!
Boogie info:
http://bostinno.com/2012/10/25/boston-halloween-pub-crawl-places-to-go-parties/

6:45 PM: Russell House Tavern. (Downstairs!) NEW!http://www.russellhousecambridge.com/

7:30 PM: Grendel's Den-- in the cellar! 

8:15 PM: Tommy Doyles-- basement opens at 6 PM.
9 PM: Pizzeria Uno's --downstairs.
9:45 PM: John Harvards brewery (downstairs!)

Adorn yourselves (if you want) with either wigs, bells, flounces, hats, fake mustaches, capes, so on. Nothing fancy needed.

PLEASE BRING CASH! NO GOBLINS WELCOME, please!
item.how_to_find_us: At Charlies, look for peeps prowling around at tall tables near the lower outdoor entrance ramp.
item.name: Cellar Dweller Pub Crawl (Plus Spooky Silent Disco!)
